backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing URL configuration requirements and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files related to routing, layout, pages, data, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryS: Button showing inquiry item count and navigating to the inquiry page.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, contact links, quick navigation links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation buttons, and contact info bar.
frontend/src/components/site/HomeBackgro: Background video component with autoplay handling and fallback gradient.
frontend/src/components/site/Interactive: Canvas-based animated blueprint background with parallax and particle effects.
frontend/src/components/site/PageTransit: Wraps children in a div with fade-in animation for page transitions.
Defines the main site layout with header, footer, background, and page transition wrapper.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports static contact details including phone numbers, email, address, and map URLs.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Provides basic site configuration such as name, URL, and description.
frontend/src/data/catalog.ts: Defines product categories with IDs, names, descriptions, and icons.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Generates gallery items from static image paths using inferred metadata and exposes category utilities.
frontend/src/data/inventory.ts: Contains the full product inventory with IDs, categories, descriptions, and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiry.ts: Provides access to inquiry list state with add, modify, remove, and count utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty object for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and UI utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Renders a category view with product listings, inquiry interactions, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact options including phone, email, and business hours using UI cards and CONTACT_INFO config.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a filterable product gallery with category buttons, item cards, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a hero section, clickable product category cards, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Manages the inquiry list, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to the lead form.
frontend/src/pages/LeadFormPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting inquiry details, validates input, saves submissions, and navigates to success.
frontend/src/pages/LeadSuccessPage.tsx: Displays a success message after inquiry submission and clears the inquiry store.
frontend/src/state/inquiryStore.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store for managing inquiry items with add, update, remove, and clear actions.
frontend/src/storage/submissions.ts: Defines a Submission interface and provides functions to save, load, and clear submissions from localStorage.
frontend/src/styles/effects.css: Contains CSS classes for 3D text and card hover effects with responsive and touch-specific behavior.
frontend/src/utils/galleryInference.ts: Parses image filenames to auto-generate product names and infer categories using keyword scoring, returning gallery metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and current build state for the Prasad Enterprise website.
